cleaned_text: Suggested Retail $12.95 each Healing Wisdom Spray is perfect to facilitate healing of the spirit and emotional body. It also has spiritual wisdom vibrations. This external elixir is a lovely blend of Tibetan Quartz & Sandalwood. Spray your crown or heart chakra to soak up the healing energy. Spray your humble abode, office or altar for healing blessings. Sandalwood is a wood of spiritual enlightenment and spiritual purification. Let the subtle scent wash over you and gently soothe your spirit. Tibetan Quartz is a Master Healer and is an intense purification and protection
